titleStmt.title: This is an encuragement to all the womens-meetings in the world who assemble together in the fear of God for the service of the truth : wherein they may see how the holy men encouraged the holy women both in the time of the law, and in the time of the Gospel, though selfish and unholy men may seek to discourage them : but go on in the name and power of Christ, and prosper / by G.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

titleStmt.title: This is an encuragement to all the womens-meetings in the world who assemble together in the fear of God for the service of the truth : wherein they may see how the holy men encouraged the holy women both in the time of the law, and in the time of the Gospel, though selfish and unholy men may seek to discourage them : but go on in the name and power of Christ, and prosper / by G.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
